title: Bokutachi wa Hanshoku wo Yameta
description:
The third year university student Shin Momotari dreams of creating the greatest movie, and one day he has a chance encounter with Hitomi Oosako, a girl beautiful enough to be mistaken as an actress. And, it just so happens that she is an entering student at the university Shin attends. Guided by fate, the two of them gradually begin to fall for each other. However, there is something that neither of them know. The one they've fallen in love with is related to them by blood, their sibling. And so opens the curtain on a pure and forbidden love story, woven by the two who must never be together.
[hr][b][u]Portuguese[/u][/b]
[spoiler]Quero fazer o melhor filme de todos! Foi abraçando esse sonho que o estudante universitário Momotari Shin encontrou a linda atriz, segundo ele, Osako Hitomi.  
Ela, de alguma forma, era caloura na mesma universidade que Shin frequenta. Levados pelo destino, Shin e Hitomi se atraem. Contudo, havia algo que os dois não sabiam.
O fato de que eram irmãos de sangue. Começa uma história de um inocente amor proibido de um casal conectado por laços inseparáveis.[/spoiler]

matches.title: Siscon Ani to Brocon Imouto ga Shoujiki ni Nattara
Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Double Seven-hen
